snippet: LEAD: The $2.5 billion merger of the Lucky and Alpha Beta supermarket chains was held up today when a Federal District Judge allowed the California Attorney General to post a $10,000 bond while appealing to the Supreme Court to overturn the merger...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: The $2.5 billion merger of the Lucky and Alpha Beta supermarket chains was held up today when a Federal District Judge allowed the California Attorney General to post a $10,000 bond while appealing to the Supreme Court to overturn the merger.
